channel.title: Black Ops Wallhack/aimbot
channel.description:
Hello all,
I have recently started a No-lag Black-Ops server, (PC of course), and many a time, people have come on my server with what is clearly a wallhack and sometimes an aimbot. I am banning them from the server, and it works every time.
However,
I am wondering if they are being banned from the whole online multiplayer, or just my server. Also, if there is a way to get these no life game-ruiners out of the online experience entirley, please let me know. My essential question is this: can a player get banned from Black Ops online, so, every single private server on the list, for using a wallhack or aimbot.
EDIT: Sorry if this is unclear, so let me use an analogy to further describe it.
A player joins my runescape private server and hes duping, so i ipban him, and hes gone for good. Allthough, he just moves to the next 317 server and dupes there too. Is there a command or way to block him from going on all 317 server on that ip or that computer?
Please help me make this laggy, wallhacking comunity a better place.
Grace, James.

item.title: Black Ops Wallhack/aimbot
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:16, topic:368738”][quote author=John459 link=topic=464879.msg3400378#msg3400378 date=1289862045]

[quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=464879.msg3399840#msg3399840 date=1289794758]you died a lot and therefore hated the game?
[/quote]
true this. i was trying to join a gun game wager match and got put in some random guys combat training. wtf?
Incorrect. I’m taking about bad spawns, bad game lobbies(especially when trying to join with a party), and some bad maps.
[/quote][/quote]

Funny because I somehow did get moved to a combat training game while trying to join an entirely different game.

Read full topic

[quote=“jmood128, post:4, topic:368738”][quote author=Exion link=topic=464879.msg3399634#msg3399634 date=1289784326]
Solution: Buy an Xbox 360 and Black Ops. No hackers/cheaters there. [size=1pt](as of right now)[/size]
[/quote]

Xbox 360 has more Hackers and Aimbotters…[/quote]
Lol? Do you even have a 360?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:8, topic:368738”][quote author=John459 link=topic=464879.msg3399754#msg3399754 date=1289789906]

Best solution buy badcompany 2!

Bought it. Hated it. Returned it.

Game is bullshit.
[/quote]
Just cause its realistic and you suck at it doesnt make it BS[/quote]Actually, the story line sucked nigdick and was terrible. Never played it after that.

item.title: Black Ops Wallhack/aimbot
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:

[quote=“John459, post:9, topic:368738”][quote author=Frell link=topic=464879.msg3399764#msg3399764 date=1289790469]

Best solution buy badcompany 2!

Bought it. Hated it. Returned it.

Game is bullshit.

Just cause its realistic and you suck at it doesnt make it BS
[/quote]

That’s not what annoyed me. I have enjoyed other of the Battlefield games.

This one just wasn’t good to me. I’m not saying black ops is much better though. It pisses me off almost as much while playing.[/quote]

So generally you died a lot and therefore hated the game?

item.title: Black Ops Wallhack/aimbot

item.description:

[quote=“jmood128, post:4, topic:368738”][quote author=Exion link=topic=464879.msg3399634#msg3399634 date=1289784326]
Solution: Buy an Xbox 360 and Black Ops. No hackers/cheaters there. [size=1pt](as of right now)[/size]
[/quote]

Xbox 360 has more Hackers and Aimbotters…[/quote]

No. PC is wayyy more susceptible to hackers and aimbotters, because the technology is more opened based. I.E its alot easier to hack, as its on the computer.
